pageTitle: findersKEEPERS Let It Rain Maxi Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 60in / 152.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported. Wash cold. 100% polyester. Fabric: Georgette. A split overlay airs out the open back of this breezy, semi-sheer georgette maxi dress. Side cutouts punctuate the scoop-neck bodice, while smooth and pleated panels alternate at the slit skirt. A metal button fastens behind the neck, and a hidden back zip closes at the waist. Double-layered bodice and miniskirt lining. Description findersKEEPERS > video play

If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Since its conception in 2009, Australian label findersKEEPERS has satisfied the niche for fun, edgy, and affordable fashion. The label has seen a swift rise in popularity, emerging onto the fashion scene in the USA and UK in 2011. With handcrafted embroidery, exclusive prints, and trademark party dresses, findersKEEPERS clothing shows true confidence in youth--at any age.
